mapper.select: SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_desc, s.phone, s.shop_img, s.longitude, s.latitude, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, p.employee_id, p.name FROM tb_shop s LEFT JOIN tb_shop_auth_map p ON s.shop_id = p.shop_id WHERE p.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT s.shop_id, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.shop_category_id, sc.shop_category_name, s.shop_name, s.shop_desc, s.shop_addr, s.phone, s.shop_img, s.longitude, s.latitude, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice FROM tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc
s.area_id = a.area_id and s.shop_category_id = sc.shop_category_id and shop_id = #{shopId}
